Articles.Content:
Hey!

A while ago I remember seeing a mod on either modding monday, facebook feed or in the add-on release forums. I don't remember what the mod was called but it had similarities with burn together. You could also decouple/seperate something with a probe part on it and a mod specific part and have the seperated thing activate stuff like parachutes if I remember correctly. I've tried google but without success.

i think you're talking about dtobi's smart parts....

of course i could be wrong but that's probably it
Or maybe KOS or maybe this mod http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98270-WIP-Plugin-DL-Flight-Computer-Fully-automated-flight-programmable-via-VPL
Thank you, it was indeed dtobi's smart parts! I'm gonna check KOS out too, looks interesting!

Or maybe MechJeb

But I think as Helix935, that's Smart Parts, it is EXCELLENT for what you demand but his modder have stop to update many of his mod :'(

And just the link for kOS: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68089

EDIT: Waw I'm too late
